#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{   int t,n;
    long long int a,prev,hcf,q,r,dnd,div,i;
    
    cin>>t;
    
    while(t)
    {   
        t--;
        cin>>n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {   cin>>a;
            if(i>0)
            {
                //finding hcf of a and prev;
                if(a<prev)
                {
                    dnd=prev;
                    div=a;
                }
                else
                {
                    dnd=a;
                    div=prev;
                }
                q=dnd;
                while(q)
                {   q=dnd/div;
                    r=dnd%div;
                    if(r==0)
                    break;  //then hcf is div;
                    else
                    {   dnd=div;
                        div=r;
                    }
                }
                prev=div;
           }
            else
            prev=a;
        }
        
        cout<<div<<endl;
        
    }
    
    return 0;
}
